attributes.action: schizophrenia and cannabis and human rights
attributes.additional_details:
The government must cease pointing to the now disproved possibility that cannabis ever really had anything to do with schizophrenia and related conditions including psychotic disorders, in the causal sense.

Schizophrenic people get very little positive press and the only time most people ever hear about them is when cannabis is being used as a political football by the press.

Please find another way to demonise cannabis if you must but leave mentally ill people out of it in future.
